about_the_game:
What can you do when you've been teleported by mistake to a new world and you're just a regular guy? You take over a shop and get rich while building up your harem of monster girls in this comfy +18 hentai RPG inspired by games like Recettear and Stardew valley!​

You will step into the shoes of an entrepreneur, running a humble shop, and serving a diverse array of customers. Along the way you will develop into a colossal business by acquiring business partners and recruiting adventurers to help you explore other worlds in search of riches. Build your harem all while stopping an evil force approaching this new fantasy world.​



In Mana Quest, you can have hentai scenes with a diverse array of girls and races!



Every character has a different body type, monster race types (Humanoid, Anthro, Monsterish) and personality to keep them interesting. Hopefully the best girl will be different for every player.

All of the adult scenes have a minimum of 8-12 variations alongside immersive dialogue, narration and actions and fluid scenes​. They will also be fully animated.

All gameplay elements also reward you with these scenes, from Mana farming to running your shop or even mini-games, you've got something spicy to work towards. You also won't have to lose in combat to see scenes.






















And more characters planned which I still don't have any art for!



Mana Quest has a lighthearted and engaging story divided into 7 chapters, including a prologue and an epilogue. The story and characters are all already written (No, I won't be making stuff up as I go along!!).


One day, while playing your favorite MMO, you suddenly get teleported into a fantasy world called Eter by a strange cat. Her name is Euna, the goddess of this realm, and she informs you that this world desperately needs your help.

There's just one problem.. you're not really the hero she was looking for, in fact you're just a regular guy!

In Eter, Mana is the essence of life, which also serves as the fundamental fuel of magic. But there's been a sudden inexplicable shortage of it. In order to prevent chaos, veteran adventurers started exploring other worlds to gather it. This is called world-hopping.



They established the city of Hoppe, a thriving hub around an ancient tree that acts as the gateway to these worlds, making it the bustling center of Eter and functioning as the main gathering point for extra-dimensional Mana. Adventurers of all kinds travel here to go world-hopping!​



In Mana Quest, your mission is to bring Mana back to Eter, get rich, collect cute monster girlfriends and become famous while doing it. Use your business skills and your party's unique strengths to help prevent a mysterious impending doom befalling upon this world!


  • Diverse character bust system - with many emotions and different poses to make everyone feel way more expressive.
  • Streamlined menus - Nearly all info is in-map or on screen, including the in-game inventory window.
  • Quest log & map window - Keeps track of events and characters.
  • Pixel movement - Utilizing custom collisions system.
  • Mana farming - gather Mana essences that help you craft and sell things.​ Comes with seasons and a weather system.
  • Crafting grid system - a 3x3 grid where you can place ingredients to make items, similar to Minecraft.
  • Monster girl management - Leveling up your farming skills will help you collect monster girls that live in your farm. You will need to take care of them.
  • Shop system - You can sell things at your shop and haggle with customers for the best deal, as well as other features like special orders, picking up specific items, etc. You will also be able to expand your shop, customize it and hire workers to help you out.
  • World-hopping exploration - You will be able to travel to other worlds via the adventurer's guild. All with different aesthetics, enemies, bosses, monster girls, etc.
  • Turn management combat system - No other gauges to take care of besides health and turn points. All skills/actions require a certain amount of turn points in order to be used. Both players and enemies can use order altering skills to mess things around. It's all about strategizing what to do with your turns! No menu browsing either. You just click on the action you want to do and then on the enemy/party member.
  • Camp system - During world-hopping you can set up camp at specific spots, these will be the only safe spots while world-hopping, you will be able to talk with party members, save the game and among other things.
  • Professions & skills - Each party member will be able to do different actions during world-hopping, for example Alna can pick up heavy objects and mine for resources.
  • Poki - A dice minigame that will help you make some money on the side.
  • Configurable controls - You can use keyboard & mouse or you can almost fully play it with just your mouse as well.

​Mana Quest is done by a 2 man team! Check out our discord so you can track development progress!

Mana Quest is coming soon as a free to play game in early access!

content_descriptors.notes:
This title features mature content that may not be suitable for all all audiences, including but not limited to, fictional depictions of graphic violence, skimpy revealing outfits, polygamy, graphic inter-species sexual scenes between adults featuring men and women, women with other women, multiple partners, machines, femdom, impregnation, and other fantasy fictional creatures like ogres, zombies, etc.

● All fictional characters depicted are over the age of 18.

● This game is a work of fiction!
Any names, organizations, locations, or events appearing in this game are fictitious. Any resemblance to real names, organizations, locations, events, etc. is purely coincidental.

detailed_description:
Play ahead of time! [Closed beta]

Join the discord server to get into the closed beta & keep up with updates, see what I'm working on and give feedback!

name: Mana Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU, at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: At least a display of 1920x1080.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core 3.5GHz CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 capable PGU (+ AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or better display.

short_description: What can you do when you've been isekai'd by mistake and you're just a regular guy? You become an entrepreneur! Take over a shop and get rich while building up your harem of monster girls in this comfy +18 hentai RPG!
